name: 戴夫·希尔

last_movies.title: 老妈撞入电视台 第二季
老妈撞入电视台 第一季

introduction: Dave Hill finds undeniable stories from new voices and elevates them.As Founder and CEO of Gumption Pictures, a multi-award winning production company, Hill leads a team of passionate and resourceful creatives to execute the vision that created the company: creating exceptional entertainment in the authentic voice of it's creators. As executive producer, Hill brought the pilot Bootstrapped to the 2019 Sundance Film Festival. TV pilots produced by Hill have appeared in festivals around the world including Cinequest (won program), Pilot Light (won program), Catalyst Content Festival, Nashville Film Festival and more. Hill wrote, directed, produced and starred in the 2015 comedy "The Night is Young" alongside Matt Jones which premiered at the Austin Film Festival.As an actor, Hill has appeared in TV shows including Great News, Modern Family, and American Dad. He is a graduate of Princeton University.
